gofo

Class GoFo

  • java.lang.Object
    • gofo.GoFo

  • public class GoFo
extends java.lang.Object
    It contains all the countries that users interact with

      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      void ownerLogin(int ownerNum)
      this function will do all owner operations like crate his playground add slots for his playground and price for each slot in real life play at day Cheaper than play at night
      void playerLogin(int playerNum)
      this function will do all player operations like book playgrounds and create a team and send invitation via mail to each member in the team
      void signup()
      method to add new users to GoFo System you should know no invalid email will be accepted no limits in user name or password but spaces are not allowed this method should sent verification code vie Mail it will print verification code (afghjk) you should enter it to sign up in system you should enter your password twice.
      void System()
      home page for the system contain all GoFo operations

    • Method Detail

      • isValid

        public static boolean isValid(java.lang.String email)
        Function to check if an email is real or not it will accept any email style one char at least before @ tow chars at least after @ and before (.) after (.) must be one char at least no spaces allowed
        Parameters:
        email - the email we will check
        Returns:
        return true if an valid email else return false

      • signup

        public void signup()
        method to add new users to GoFo System you should know no invalid email will be accepted no limits in user name or password but spaces are not allowed this method should sent verification code vie Mail it will print verification code (afghjk) you should enter it to sign up in system you should enter your password twice.

      • playerLogin

        public void playerLogin(int playerNum)
        this function will do all player operations like book playgrounds and create a team and send invitation via mail to each member in the team
        Parameters:
        playerNum - the number of player in Players array in system

      • adminLogin

        public void adminLogin()
        this function will allow admin to accept the new playgrounds user Name admin1 password admin1

      • ownerLogin

        public void ownerLogin(int ownerNum)
        this function will do all owner operations like crate his playground add slots for his playground and price for each slot in real life play at day Cheaper than play at night
        Parameters:
        ownerNum - the number of owner in owner array in system
